about_the_game:
This spritepack includes 16 new sprites for the Western Europeans in the last 18th and early 19th century of Europa Universalis III. Unique uniforms for:
  • Dutch
  • French
  • Spanish
  • English
  • British
  • Portuguese
  • Danish
  • Prussian
  • Scottish
  • Swedish
  • Austrian
  • Venetian
  • American
  • Scandinavian
  • Revolutionary French
  • and a generic western one
Sixteen historically authentic modeled units for the “Age of Revolution” with new animations, for a more realistic and more beautiful game atmosphere. Units are equipped with muskets, sabers, shakos, and backpacks. The generic western units are embellished for this period, too.

name: Europa Universalis III: Revolution SpritePack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Europa Universalis III: Revolution SpritePack

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Windows® 2000 (with Service pack 1 or higher) or Windows® XP (Home/Professional/Media Edition) with Service Pack 2.
  • Processor: 1.9GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon processor or equivalent with 512MB RAM (1.0GB RAM is highly recommended)
  • Memory:
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Card with Hardware T&L and support for Pixelshader 2.0 or better
  • DirectX Version: DirectX9.0c
  • Hard Drive: At least 1GB of free hard drive space to accommodate game files and saved games. This does not include any space used by the Windows® swap file.
  • Sound: DirectX7 compatible sound card
